all_text_timv: Strauss, Richard, 1864-1949. Letzte Lieder Four last songs ; Six orchestral songs / Richard Strauss. Holland : Philips, [1985?], ℗1983. 1 audio disc : digital ; 4 3/4 in. performed music prm rdacontent audio s rdamedia audio disc sd rdacarrier Digital classics Philips: 411 052-2. Orchesterlieder originally for voice and piano ; orchestrated by Robert Heger. Sung in German. Title on container: Vier letzte Lieder = Four last songs ; 6 Orchesterlieder = 6 orchestral songs. Compact disc ; digital recording. German texts with English and French translations included in container. Issued also as analog disc (6514 322) and as cassette (7337 322). Four last songs: Frühling ; September ; Beim Schlafengehen ; Im Abendrot -- Six orchestral songs: Cäcilie, op. 27, no. 2 ; Morgen, op. 27, no. 4 ; Weigenlied, op. 41, no. 1 ; Ruhe, meine Seele, op. 27, no. 1 ; Meinem Kinde, op. 37, no. 3 ; Zueignung, op. 10, no. 1. Jessye Norman, soprano ; Gewandhausorchester Leipzig ; Kurt Masur, conductor. Recorded in Paul-Gerhardt-Kirche, Leipzig, Aug. 1982. Songs (High voice) with orchestra. Songs (High voice) with orchestra. fast (OCoLC)fst01126150 Norman, Jessye. prf Masur, Kurt. cnd Strauss, Richard, 1864-1949. Lieder, op. 27. Selections; arranged. Strauss, Richard, 1864-1949. Lieder, op. 41. Wiegenlied; arranged. Strauss, Richard, 1864-1949. Lieder, op. 37. Meinem Kinde; arranged. Strauss, Richard, 1864-1949. Lieder, op. 10. Zueignung; arranged. Gewandhausorchester Leipzig. prf Last songs. Orchestral songs. Orchesterlieder. Vier letze lieder. Digital classics.
